content.body: jjaschke (out until Dec 1), smaug, if you're around at TPAC we can perhaps do some navigation API whiteboarding to resolve some of the pending messy issues. I understand farre won't be there unfortunately. Anyone else who's around is welcome of course (e.g. Dominic Farolino)

I understand farre won't be there unfortunately. Anyone else who's around is welcome of course (e.g. Dominic Farolino)

content.body: I don't think wait-for-all is that messy. The spec is mostly good in that case, and API is part of interop, so "encouraging browsers to precisely match the web standards " ðŸ˜‰  But yeah, that issue, and perhaps others too should be discussed.
And we should also discuss about that "encouraging browsers to precisely match the web standards " part.
It's messy when there is a divergence between WPTs and spec which in some cases begs the question of which one is correct.
anyway, I saw that the process/meta question is already on the agenda requests but what I want is to spend a bit of time on the specifics and make sure we make the right decisions for users/web-devs.
